[[inst_lb_pcr]]
==== LB.PCR

*Syntax:* lb.pcr [symbol], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit signed byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lb_pcr.svg[LB.PCR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
